author: sushildubey171
body:
This is GPU version of RawToDigi.

- The cabling map required for RawToDigi is stored in the ascii file (name of file Pixel_Phase1_Raw2Digi_GPU_Cabling_Map.dat) in directory EventFilter/SiPixelRawToDigi/test and uploaded to the GPU memory.

- Headers and trailers checks are performed in the SiPixelRawToDigi.cc for each FED.

- The program first collects raw data of each FED together maximum upto 128 events and then transfers to the device memory asynchronously using cuda streams. The entry point to the GPU code is `RawToDigi_wrapper` in SiPixelRawToDigi.cc

- The device functions `RawToDigi_kernel` performs RawToDigi conversion on GPU

- After RawToDigi conversion `applyADCthreshold_kernel` is invoked (optional through bool convertADCtoElectrons) which performs calibrations ADC to Electrons and applies channel thresholding. The ADC to Electrons calibration and thresholding is required by Clustering algorithm.
title: GPU RawToDigi C940
